column2: You meet another Mech Suit pilot on the battlefield. You notice they are moving towards you to engage...
You avoid meeting the enemy's mech on the battlefield. This can be seen as cowardly
May fortune be on my side
Manuever your Mech Suit to meet your opponent in battle

It was a close battle, but your opponent's Mech Suit has bested your suit in combat. Your allies manage to rescue you and tow your Mech Suit before the enemy could finish you off, but you'll need time to heal after a fight like this.
With great skill and tact, you and your Mech Suit defeat your opponent and smash their mech suit. Unfortunately, they managed to retreat with their life before you could finish them off.
